price: Jedhi: "fokkataaniifi gaariin wal hin qixxaatanu, Odoma baay’inni wantoota fokkataa si dinqisiiseeyyuu".  Yaa warra qalbii qabdan akka milkooftaniif jecha Rabbiin sodaadhaa.
arabic: قُل لَّا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡخَبِيثُ وَٱلطَّيِّبُ وَلَوۡ أَعۡجَبَكَ كَثۡرَةُ ٱلۡخَبِيثِۚ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul lā yastawī al-khabīthu wal-ṭayibu walaw aʿjabaka kathratu al-khabīthi fa-ittaqū al-laha yāulī al-albābi laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
